import React from 'react'; function Profile({currentUser}) { const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setLocalUser(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [firstName]: value })); setLocalUser(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [lastNameName]: value })); setLocalUser(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [email]: value })); setLocalUser(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [phone]: value })); setLocalUser(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [address]: value })); }; return ( <>
